column4: How do I set permissions for myself so that I can use sftp and create directories/upload files? My ssh/sftp account is already set up
you want to upload to a shell ?
I want to sftp into my server and upload files to it, I can connect and see the files/dir's but can't do anything
sftp , then issue put filename or get filename
It says access denied when I try that
ssh into and try to touch something
if you cant do that, then rights are wrong for your homedir
Alright I can do stuff in my home dir, lemme try it in my ftp client again
are you using a regular ftp client?
what os are you using to connect with?
ok I can do stuff in my home directory in filezilla, i was trying to add a seperate ftp folder for several users to access
